text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob
Isn’t it a beautiful day?
And we can learn so much here
But Bob I don’t want to do lessons today.
No lessons Johnny….. We are going to play a little game.
What’s the game?
I am going to sing a song and you kids have to enact it. Like if I sing….

This is the way we like to run
Like to run, Like to run

This is the way we like to run
On such an awesome day
Now, when I sing this…I want you all to run till that tree and run back. So are you ready?
Yay!

This is the way we like to jump
Like to jump, like to jump

Up and down we jump and jump
On such an awesome day

This is the way we like to eat
Like to eat, like to eat

A lovely yummy yummy treat
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to clean
Like to clean, like to clean

This is the way we’re squeaky clean
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to drink
Like to drink, like to drink

Lemonade that’s pink we drink
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to laugh
Like to laugh, like to laugh

We laugh a belly full hearty laugh
On such an awesome day

This is the way we like to sleep
Like to sleep, like to sleep

This is the way we sleep so deep
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to dance
Like to dance, like to dance

To twist and twirl and dance and prance
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to play
Like to play, like to play

Oh don’t we all just love to play
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to fold
Like to fold, like to fold

We fold and fold just like we’re told
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to carry
Like to carry, like to carry

While we carry we all make merry
On such an awesome day!

This is the way we like to walk
Like to walk, like to walk

A really nice relaxing walk
On such an awesome day!
So did you enjoy learning action words?
Action words?

Eat, drink, jump and run
Are actions words that are fun.

So are laugh, sleep, dance and clean
Actions in our daily routine

Fold and carry are action words 
Action words, action words

So are dance walk and play 
Action words Hurray !
Hurray!
